description_text:
I would like to ask about your affiliate commission payout schedule on
GoAff. Could you please let me know when and how often the affiliate
commissions are paid?

Thank you very much for your assistance. I look forward to your response.



[image: Mailsuite] Email tracked with Mailsuite  ·  Opt out
<https://u.list-prefs.com/en/privacy/opt-out/unsubscribe/c79f6dc79b525529f24b3d1dd9dee56f0c00a012/874552a035a6f820cb6651f68cc079b44b020d644812182d39d448b6cdb847de5f6e25432d29184a53ea16a840f1d58b558d10caa73119b63566e5750245d02b>
11:52:50 17/12/25

conversations.body_text: Hi david john,     Commission payments are issued monthly due to our 30-day return policy. Thank you for your understanding.

Dear Simsonn Team,

I am writing to ask why my commission for November 2025 has not yet been
paid. Additionally, I generated over $8,000 in sales during that month, but
my commission rate remains at 6%.

Could you please clarify the reason for the delay in payment and explain
why my commission rate has not been increased despite the sales
performance? I would appreciate your review of this matter and any possible
adjustment to my commission rate.

Thank you for your time and support. I look forward to your response.

Best regards,
David John

Vào Thứ 4, 17 thg 12, 2025 vào lúc 12:45 service@simsonn.com <
service@simsonn.com> đã viết:

> Hi david john,
>
> Commission payments are issued monthly due to our 30-day return policy.
> Thank you for your understanding.
>
>

Hi david john,     Your current sales volume is 8,000, and we have already increased your commission rate to 8%. When your annual sales reach 9,000, please remind us to adjust it to 10%.  Additionally, November commissions will be disbursed in early January.

As discussed previously, my sales were at 8,000 and the commission rate was
adjusted to 8%. Once annual sales reached 9,000, the commission rate was to
be increased to 10%.

I would like to inform you that my sales have now *exceeded 9,000*, and I
kindly ask for your support in adjusting the commission rate to *10%* in
accordance with our agreement.

Vào Thứ 4, 17 thg 12, 2025 vào lúc 13:14 service@simsonn.com <
service@simsonn.com> đã viết:

> Hi david john,
>
> Your current sales volume is 8,000, and we have already increased your
> commission rate to 8%. When your annual sales reach 9,000, please remind us
> to adjust it to 10%.
> Additionally, November commissions will be disbursed in early January.
>
>
>
>
Hi david john,    Okay, we've made the changes for you.

Thanks for the update. However, it looks like there is still 20 EUR
missing. We’ve only received an additional 40 EUR so far.

Could you please check this again for us?


Vào Th 3, 23 thg 12, 2025 lúc 15:57 service@simsonn.com

Sorry for the confusion, I sent the email by mistake.

Hello,

Happy New Year to you.

I am writing to follow up on my affiliate commission payment. As the new
year has already begun, I would like to ask why I have not yet received my
affiliate payout.

According to my account, the commission has been approved, but the payment
has not been processed so far. Could you please help me check the payment
status and let me know when I can expect to receive it?

If you need any additional information from my side, please let me know. I
would appreciate your support and clarification.

Thank you for your time and assistance.

Hi david john,    We've just wrapped up the holiday period, and our finance team is currently compiling the figures. Your payment will be disbursed within the next couple of days, so please don't worry.

No worries, thanks for the update!
